results.title: Controlling Herpes Simplex Virus-Induced Immunoinflammatory Lesions Using Metabolic Therapy: a Comparison of 2-Deoxy-d-Glucose with Metformin.
results.text_hl: This report evaluates the effect of drugs that cause metabolic reprogramming on lesion expression using two drugs that affect @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ metabolism: @CHEMICAL_Deoxyglucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003847 @@@2-deoxy-d-glucose@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Deoxyglucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003847 @@@2DG@@@) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. Both drugs could limit @<m>DISEASE_Keratitis_Herpetic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016849 @@@HSK@@@ severity, but @CHEMICAL_Deoxyglucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003847 @@@2DG@@@ therapy could result in @DISEASE_Encephalitis_Herpes_Simplex @DISEASE_MESH:D020803 @@@herpes encephalitis@@@ if used when replicating virus was still present.
